entry.title: Hands-Free Machine Learning With Auto-Sklearn 2
entry.summary: Auto-Sklearn is a library for automatic machine learning developed by AutoML group from Freibug-Hannover, Germany. Generate tabular classification prediction using auto-sklearn 2 Main components of the library: # Import libraries import autosklearn.experimental.askl2 import autosklearn.metrics # Configure model parameters classifier = autosklearn.experimental.askl2.AutoSklearn2Classifier( ...
